metadata.title: CVE-2023-6931 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - high
metadata.description:
A heap out-of-bounds write vulnerability in the Linux kernel's PerformanceEvents system component can be exploited to achieve local privilegeescalation. A perf_event's read_size can overflow, leading to an heapout-of-bounds increment or write in perf_read_group(). We recommendupgrading past commit 382c27f4ed28f803b1f1473ac2d8db0afc795a1b.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-6931` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-15-generic - 6.5.0-15.15
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-15-generic - 6.5.0-15.15
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-15-generic-64k - 6.5.0-15.15
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1012-aws - 6.5.0-1012.12
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1011-azure - 6.5.0-1011.11
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1011-gcp - 6.5.0-1011.11
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1008-laptop - 6.5.0-1008.11
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-15-lowlatency - 6.5.0-15.15.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-15-lowlatency-64k - 6.5.0-15.15.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1014-oracle - 6.5.0-1014.14
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1009-raspi - 6.5.0-1009.12
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1006-starfive - 6.5.0-1006.7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-15.15').
linux-aws package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1012.12').
linux-azure package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1011.11').
linux-gcp package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1011.11').
linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support, was needs-triage').
linux-laptop package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1008.11').
linux-lowlatency package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-15.15.1').
linux-oracle package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1014.14').
linux-raspi package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1009.12').
linux-starfive package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1006.7').
